content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at position(0,0) processing iron ore
- Furnace 2 at position(2,0) processing iron ore
Both furnaces are operational and fueled by coal

### Copper Plate Production Line
- Stone furnace at position(4,4) processing copper ore into copper plates
- Furnace is operational and fueled by coal

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line
Located around position(9.5,11.5), consists of:
- Input chest at position(6.5,11.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at position(7.5,11.5) moving materials from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at position(9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5,11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at position(12.5,11.5) storing completed electronic circuits

### Power Generation System
Located around position(-7,24.5), consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5) extracting water
- Pipe network connecting water supply
- Boiler at position(-7,24.5) heating water into steam
- Steam engine at position(-2.5,24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Research Facility
Located around position(0.5,28.5), consists of:
- Lab for conducting research
- Burner inserter at position(0.5,30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at position(0.5,31.5) containing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Assembler Resource Shortages
- Ensure consistent supply of copper cables to prevent assembler ingredient shortages
- Monitor input chest inventory levels to maintain production flow

### Fuel Management Issues
- Keep monitoring and refilling boiler fuel levels to prevent power interruptions
- Maintain adequate coal supplies in all burner inserters and furnaces

### Production Line Balance
- Monitor furnace ingredient levels to prevent NO_INGREDIENTS status
- Ensure proper distribution of raw materials across all production lines
